difference.question: What makes TechIns8 different from other job sites?
difference.intro: TechIns8 isn't just a job site, it's your personal job search assistant:
points: Our AI acts as an HR expert: it detects false promises, verifies daily rates, and ensures that "full remote" REALLY means full remote.
No more juggling between platforms: all your searches, all your offers, in one place.

analysis.question: How does the offer analysis work?
analysis.answer: Our AI analyzes each job offer to verify the consistency of information. It specifically ensures that the advertised working conditions are real and that the required skills are consistent.

sources.question: What are the sources of job offers?
sources.answer: We aggregate offers from "FreeWork" and "Welcome To The Jungle" to give you a complete view of the market. Our AI analyzes and enriches each offer for better transparency.

tjm.question: How is the daily rate calculated?
tjm.answer: The daily rate is calculated based on market data and information provided in the offer. Our AI verifies the consistency of advertised amounts with required skills and experience.

linkedin.question: I already have alerts on LinkedIn, why pay for TechIns8?
linkedin.part1: LinkedIn and other platforms send you all offers matching your keywords, without verification.
linkedin.part2: These alerts are often full of fake "full remote" offers, unrealistic daily rates, or worse, listings that don't match your skills at all.
linkedin.part3: Result? You waste time filtering manually. TechIns8 does this work for you, grouping offers from multiple sources and verifying their quality.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel at any time. If you're not satisfied within the first 30 days, we'll refund you in full, no questions asked.

updates.question: How many new offers are added?
updates.answer: We update our database daily. Currently, we analyze offers from FreeWork and Welcome To The Jungle, and more sources will be added soon.
